revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #11 Oram (Bluk) |image = [[File:Bluk.png]] |caption = Aunque esta pequeña y delicada Baya es de color azul, al comerla la boca se vuelve negra. |growtime = 5m 30s |harvest = 9 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.8% |points = 20 |flavor =
*0 picante *10 seco *10 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Oram (Bluk)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Chesto|Atania (Chesto)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Leppa|Zanama (Leppa)]]. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 3 mins 20 seg || 4 mins 10 seg || 5 mins || 5 mins 30 seg - 11 mins |- !Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 5 min 30 seg -
11 min |- ! Psydugadera | 3 min 40 seg -
7 min 20 seg |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Bluk_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Bluk berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Leppa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chesto]] || 40 secs until ripe || 26 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Bluk berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Cornn.png|20px]] [[Cornn]] || [[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]]
[[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|20px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]]
[[File:Cornn.png|20px]] [[Cornn]]
[[File:Pamtre.png|20px]] [[Pamtre]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Seafloor Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Eterna Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Sea Spirit's Den|Common}} |} |}

revision.comment: Created page with "'''Oram (Bluk)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Chesto|Atania (Chesto)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Leppa|Zanama (Leppa)]]."

revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #11 Oram (Bluk) |image = [[File:Bluk.png]] |caption = Aunque esta pequeña y delicada Baya es de color azul, al comerla la boca se vuelve negra. |growtime = 5m 30s |harvest = 9 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.8% |points = 20 |flavor =
*0 picante *10 seco *10 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }}
'''Bluk''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Chesto]] and at least 1 [[Leppa]].
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 20 secs || 4 mins 10 secs || 5 mins || 5 mins 30 secs - 11 mins |- !Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 5 mins 30 secs -
11 mins |- ! Sprayduck | 3 mins 40 secs -
7 mins 20 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Bluk_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Bluk berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Leppa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chesto]] || 40 secs until ripe || 26 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}

Bluk berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
